body_html:
It's too far out to really reason about.

We will for now eagerly load all the dlls we find (which are appropriate for the machine architecture we're on, e.g., we may skip the one containing GPU kernels on a machine without GPU, or the one built with AVX512 on a machine without that SIMD instruction set. @gunan FYI.

It's too far out to really reason about.
We will for now eagerly load all the dlls we find (which are appropriate for the machine architecture we're on, e.g., we may skip the one containing GPU kernels on a machine without GPU, or the one built with AVX512 on a machine without that SIMD instruction set. @gunan FYI.
body:
It's too far out to really reason about. 

We will for now eagerly load all the dlls we find (which are appropriate for the machine architecture we're on, e.g., we may skip the one containing GPU kernels on a machine without GPU, or the one built with AVX512 on a machine without that SIMD instruction set. @gunan FYI.
